actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation

official_title: To direct the Commandant of the Coast Guard to convey certain property from the United States to the County of Marin, California.
short_title: Point Reyes Coast Guard Housing Conveyance Act

summary.text:
Point Reyes Coast Guard Housing Conveyance Act - Directs the Coast Guard to sell property in Point Reyes Station to Marin County, California, for use as affordable housing or for a related purpose. Requires the property to be sold at fair market value.

Conditions conveyance on the county authorizing the United States to locate a navigational aid on the property.

titles.title: Point Reyes Coast Guard Housing Conveyance Act
To direct the Commandant of the Coast Guard to convey certain property from the United States to the County of Marin, California.
